Source.Name: ricochet
Source.Summary: Anonymous metadata-resistant instant messaging that just works.
Source.Description: Ricochet is an experimental kind of instant messaging that doesn't trust anyone with your identity, your contact list, or your communications.

Package.Summary: Anonymous metadata-resistant instant messaging that just works.
